title: Facebook comic font
content:
Facebook comic's font with accents, lower and uppercase letters.  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113042im_/http:/visitors.hu/sample.jpg)

More samples on the comic's facebook page:  
 [https://www.facebook.com/gecicicaofficial/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113042/https:/www.facebook.com/gecicicaofficial/ "https://www.facebook.com/gecicicaofficial/")

Font: 

 Animated 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113042/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Stephen999

comments.content: It looks like **[Animated](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113042/http:/www.dafont.com/animated.font?text=Fricike+torolte+mindenkinek)** by Geronimo Fonts [Free for personal use], but I don't know if the free edition has the accented glyphs
The free version has no accented glyphs - looks like they used comma and period to make needed accents.
Thank you! Its Animated font indeed.
